Reviews.Title: “Much better than the average beach lodging!”
Reviews.Author: MaggieTN50
Reviews.Content: We stayed overnight with a group on our return trip from Key West and were very pleased with this HIE. Thought at first that property was new based on room condition but were surprised to later discover it was not entirely new but had been recently updated to meet HIE standards. Stayed on the 11th floor in a king room, and the bedding, as well as everything else, was wonderful. Loved the view! Room was really large and would have been great for an extended stay. Could not find an ice machine on our floor - decided we could do without it, so didn't go looking. With our stay occurring after Labor Day, our group had the whole top floor to ourselves which was nice. Had to leave early the next morning and did not get to try the breakfast - had a tasty cup of coffee, though. Staff were friendly and helpful. Want to remember this place for future trips to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel by the Sea”
Reviews.Author: Robert T
Reviews.Content: We live in Nevada, and as such, we had never actually visited the Atlanic Ocean. So while we were in Florida anyway, we decided to see what it looked like. I researched several hotels before settling on this one. We wanted a place on the ocean beach with a view. This place fits the bill. The building is skinny, so there is only one row of rooms per floor, which means that each room faces the ocean and has a great view– and a balcony! There is a pool in the back, between the building and the ocean beach, and YES, there is direct, free access to the beach. You can hear the surf from your room, and if you're really fortunate, you can catch a full moon rising over the horizon in the evening. The amenities are up to the usual HIE standards, including the breakfast (and don't miss the ice cream vending machine on the bottom floor). For all of this, the price was very reasonable, and we ended up staying an extra day. We would definitely return, although, unfortunately, we may never have another chance...

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great location”
Reviews.Author: EmsMomTina
Reviews.Content: My husband, daughter and I stayed here for 4 nights in July 2012. I thought I had booked a King room with sofa bed, but when we went to our room, we saw no sofa. The girl at the front desk couldn't have been nicer and set us up with the correct room type. Our room was very clean and comfortable. LOVE the beds. I didn't like how there was a regular door instead of a sliding glass door to the balconey, but that was my only room complaint. The pool was small, but adequate. They do not have a hot tub :( My major disapointment was breakfast. The only fresh fruit was apples. Couldn't get anywhere near the pancake station, there was always a line no matter when you went to breakfast. There was a hot entree each morning, but nothing great. We went out to breakfast rather than fight with the lines. All in all, I liked the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel by the Sea”
Reviews.Author: lewwen31
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights last week. We loved our room! Clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the view and the pool. The desk staff was pleasant. I want to add a special thank you to the asst. manager. He was soooo helpful to us during our stay, as was Hayley. The breakfast lady was sweet and helpful. She walked around to ask how breakfast was and if we needed anything. Breakfast was awesome! We will be back for sure!

Reviews.Title: “unprofessional staff”
Reviews.Author: leif a
Reviews.Content: I booked a 3 day stay with my family on this hotel everything was fine until the next morning when we went to have some breakfast by the loby. my 2 year old dauther was just waking up and she started crying so my wife took her out side and we over heard the staff talking about it and made a comment saying "that's why they shouldn't take kids in this hotel". I was very unhappy with my stay and will not recommend this hotel unless they get a new staff.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel in Great Location”
Reviews.Author: jcre
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel located in the more quiet area of Daytona Beach Shores. All rooms are oceanfront so not a bad room anywhere. Easy access to the beautiful beach. Had no trouble parking and found the location very convenient to all types of restaurants and near several grocery stores. The balconies are a bonus. Only issue I had was sporadic internet outages. Excellent breakfast and efficient, friendly staff. Will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING STAY!!”
Reviews.Author: Family T
Reviews.Content: This hotel is WONDERFUL!! I can't say enough great things about it! We had originally booked a different hotel, had a TERRIBLE experience there on our first night, checked out the next morning and stayed at the Holiday Inn Express. BEST decision we made!! The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. We had 2 adults and 2 kids in the room and had plenty of space to spread out. Lots of places for luggage, large bathroom, nice shower, great breakfast every morning, with hot items (sausage, eggs, cinnamon rolls, pancakes, yogurt, etc). My FAVORITE part though was the ocean view!! The previous hotel (that was awful!!) said they had ocean view rooms, and I paid extra for it. That was a joke...you had to stand in one corner of the balcony and crane your neck to get a glimpse of the ocean. At Holiday Inn Express, you get a TRUE ocean view room. We were on the 10th floor and had a GORGEOUS view!! Watching the sunrises and sunsets on that balcony was a highlight of each day! It was so peaceful on the beach in front of the hotel (not very crowded at all)! The hotel pool was very nice! My kids loved it! One morning, my husband was on the beach and saw a sea turtle returning to the ocean after laying its eggs up on the beach. It was an incredible sight and he was able to video it! We loved our stay so much , that we even extended our vacation an extra 2 nights there! It was sooo worth it! There is ample parking in a well lit lot, and the staff are very friendly!! I won't stay anywhere else when we return to Daytona Beach Shores!! Well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: “Will definetly be back”
Reviews.Author: JSullivan72
Reviews.Content: Very clean room with great view. Very nice pool with great color at night. Very friendly staff and the location is great for visiting. Breakfast was very tasty and well stocked. We will be back for another stay really soon.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay/Very Friendly & Efficient Staff”
Reviews.Author: Eddie C
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights (Aug 1 through 3) and were impressed with both the friendliness and responsiveness of ALL of the staff. Everything was superb, the room was real nice, service was excellent, and since all rooms were oceanfront, the view was fabulous. This hotel is actually located in Daytona Beach Shores so it is in a location that is not as crowded as Daytona Beach (north of this location). It's easy to find and has a lot more parking than many oceanfront hotels. We look forward to returning in the future. EC

Reviews.Title: “Great view/ friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: amy t
Reviews.Content: This hotel was in an amazing location. The view of the beach from our balcony in our room was awesome!...Rooms were clean and hotel is on the smaller side, so it was quiet, which my family loves. Even being right in front of the elevator, we never heard any noise..& we were up until at least 11:30 every night. The free breakfast was so nice, you could eat down stairs or just take it back to your room. The fridge was a great bonus!..Made it easy to have cool drinks & snacks as we came to visit from California. The staff is very friendly & helped us with our needs. I would definitely recommend staying here if ever in Daytona beach..as we would love to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in the middle of the week”
Reviews.Author: Mike E
Reviews.Content: I am a frequent guest at the holiday Inn chain, the priority program can not be beat. I stayed in this location for 2 nights (Tues. 07/24-07/26). The location is ideal for a relaxing stay, it is south of the Daytona Beach boardwalk, so it is less crowded and very quite. the room we stayed in was on the 11th floor and it was ocean front (all rooms are ocean front). it was enjoyable just to sit on the balcony or bed and have the glorious Atlantic ocean right there. you can hear the waves crashing from the room. the free breakfast and Free WiFi are icing on the cake. the service was great, we checked in a couple of hours earlier, the reception was great. I will definitely be back since I live in Orlando and this will be my new weekend getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Very Relaxing Weekend”
Reviews.Author: RykersGrandma
Reviews.Content: Stayed in room 1116 from 7/20 to 7/22. The room was well maitained but did show a slight bit of wear. This hotel is directly on the beach and all rooms are ocean view. The pool was smaller but very clean and never seemed too crowded. The hotel is located in a much quieter area of Daytona Beach, mostly couples and families. Several excellent resturants are within driving distance, make sure you try Aunt Catfish!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful for family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Bignolefan
Reviews.Content: My family and I enjoyed a wonderful vacation at the Hi in Daytona Beach. It's actually in Daytona Beach Shores which is the quiter end of the beach. No drunk teens tc.!!! Hotel appears to be newly renovated and the staff is both friendly and helpful. We'll be back again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, no hassles”
Reviews.Author: byanks7
Reviews.Content: We recently had a 2-night stay at the Holiday Inn express in Daytona Beach Florida. I was looking for a nice place to decelerate after the whirlwind known as a Disney vacation. Once again counting on TA, I was looking for a place on the beach, with oceanfront balcony rooms that offered a free breakfast for my party of 6. This hotel fit the bill. After an hour and a half ride from Orlando and arriving at 12 noon, check in was immediate for one of the 2 rooms we had reserved. This allowed us to get the luggage in and get right on the beach. The room was clean and fresh and had a fridge and a microwave, and in room safe. The balcony was adequate with a beautiful ocean in front of us. Throughout the stay, the staff was friendly and helpful. Parking was free and close to the entrance. There was always hot coffee in the lobby. The breakfast was very good, with an automated make it yourself pancake machine, scrambled eggs and sausage, along with the other standard breakfast fare. The hotel was right on Atlantic Avenue, with the usual diners, fast food and pizzerias nearby. The chains; Chilies, Texas Roadhouse, etc. were all within 5 miles. Do yourself a favor and skip the “boardwalk”. Its tiny compared to the New Jersey type, its crowded, has little to no entertainment, and you wont be able to park nearby. The one negative I encountered was that the free Wi-Fi signal at the hotel was very weak, as my IPad wouldn’t stay connected. The hotel was more than adequate for all our needs, I liked it and would certainly return. The ocean was warm and very pleasurable for swimming, and “surprise” several manatees swam by

Reviews.Title: “VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH CUSTOMER SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: vzrodriguez
Reviews.Content: Sent my mother and daughter on a trip for a week, and asked them about the payment charge requisitions, to make sure all things were paid by me,and they have LOST my paper work... Needless to say this is not an organized or very safe place to deal with. WHO knows where my documents are and what they have done with them. Still in the process of getting charges filled to my mothers account (instead of mine) refunded. Very disapointed the manager was very friendly, and quick to charge the correct credit card, however did nothing to help with the overdrafting charges from the other card. Not the Grandmother/Granddaughter vacation I envisioned. She is now out over $150 in fees. WILL NOT RECOMMEND this hotel again. Perfect location, bad customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Great ocean view”
Reviews.Author: faxmanrich
Reviews.Content: All rooms have a great view of the beach and ocean. The hotel is smoke free and the rooms are very new and modern. The shower/tub is a nice size and has a rainfall adjustable shower head .Their is towel shelves on the wall inside the shower which is very convenient. The beds are really comfy and the pillows are plush. The flat screen tv is nice too, although not set up for high def stations. The check in was fast and friendly. We had reservations but were a couple hours early, and was lucky enough to have a room ready on the 10th floor. The breakfast had quite a variety of cereal, yogart, eggs, sausage, pancakes, cinnamon rolls, toast, bagels, juice, coffee, etc. The food was hot and fresh and the lady in charge of breakfast area was super nice. Parking was free as was wifi. Overall a great place to stay and will come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous view”
Reviews.Author: traceyleep
Reviews.Content: We got a king room on the 9th floor, and the view was just spectacular! The hotel is in good shape for being ocean front. Nice large clean pool, with plenty of chairs & areas for guests. We loved the location, right in the middle of the places we wanted to go. Things that make this hotel excellent: check-in. We were coming in for a weekend Fri-Sun. stay. We wanted to check in early, and were told, to give the front desk a phone number they will call as soon as a room is ready. Guess what? They called within the hour, and we checked in at 10:30. Room was clean and comfortable. AC worked beautifully. Bedding is extra nice with a soft duvet comforter. Furniture was in great condition, carpets were clean and we had plenty of towels. Nice bar/cabinet area with a sink, and small fridge perfect for snacks & beer. Our only complaint is on the balcony there are 2 chairs, but nowhere to put a drink a small table would be great, but that's our only complaint. We really enjoyed our weekend. We would recommend this hotel, and we would come back in a minute. Front desk was really helpful from beginning of reservation to ending. Oh and this is a small point, but I loved the lotion...don't know what it is but I wish I had asked for an extra!!

Reviews.Title: “"One of the BEST Hotels I've ever stayed at! "”
Reviews.Author: kporter04
Reviews.Content: From our check-in experience down to our Housekeeping room service, our stay here was remarkable! The guest rooms were very, very clean and bathrooms were flawless. The staff was also very accomodating and helpful as well. Oceanfront properties are usually one of the hardest to maintain, but this staff has done an excellent job of that, and they deserve to be recognized.

Reviews.Title: “Oceanview that is worth it”
Reviews.Author: 911TechWV
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with an awesome view. Nothing much outstanding about the property. The staff are great and friendly. The lobby is easily the nicest part of the hotel. Room was comfortable and service was good.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: carmelo15
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have stayed here and it was just as nice as the first. The rooms are very clean, comfortable and have everything you need for a night or a week. The beds are extremely comfortable with choice of firm or soft pillows. The view of the beach and ocean from you own private balcony ( every room is oceanfront) makes the stay just that much more worth it. Everyone from Joyce the general manager right down to the room attendants are super friendly and accommodating. The continental breakfast has good variety and you have got to try the cinnamon rolls, to die for. The pool area is well maintained, very clean and a great place to hang out day or night. This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed at and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to stay in Daytona Beach. I will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Really Enjoyed Holiday Inn Express”
Reviews.Author: Anne W
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Express is a great place to stay. All rooms are ocean front and very clean. The breakast is good with a varied selection of foods.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, very clean, friendly and the view!”
Reviews.Author: Midwestguy81
Reviews.Content: Before arriving my expectations were high because of all the great reviews. Well they were correct. The customer service was awesome, the rooms were clean and smoke free with the best view of the ocean. I enjoyed being away from the craziness of daytona and when I went to spend an evening in daytona the receptionist called a cab for us. I stayed for three nights during memorial weekend. Even with the tropical storm beryl I still had some great beach time. I will be returning without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: “Our best stay ever in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: HIGHLIGHTS
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at many different hotels on this coast line over several years ,this is our favourite. Manager/Staff extremely friendly. Our room very clean/modern/comfortable. Location is ideal on the beach with plenty of good restaurants nearby Breakfast included was excellent with a varied menu daily. Free internet was very much appreciated

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful beachfront Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Shirley D
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located on a section of beach that is close to Daytona yet does not have as much of a crowd. The front desk staff was very helpful and we were able to check in early which is always a plus. The room, we had a suite, was a nice size and very clean. The balcony was wonderful with an awesome view of everything. The room even also had a window that provided a wonderful view of the river. The free breakfast was nice, and allowed us to get to the beach earlier since we did not have to go in search of a place to eat each morning. Remember to bring beach towels since the "pool" towels that are provided by the hotel are very small. We definitely plan to return!

Reviews.Title: “Best of Daytona”
Reviews.Author: Kbysb
Reviews.Content: This motel is closer to Port Orange and well away from the usual noise and crowd at Daytona. The rooms were very nice with excellent ocean views from the room and pool. The staff was friendly and professional. We enjoyed it so much we stayed extra days and plan to return.

Reviews.Title: “When they say Oceanfront...they mean it!”
Reviews.Author: Lgrif
Reviews.Content: A real winner ! After being on a road trip from California for 20 + days we have learned to expect the unexpected ! This time it was having a room that was really directly on the ocean. We found the newer decor pleasing, the room was clean the staff was accommodating. After a very restful night we were sorry we had to leave.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent property,very clean, beautiful views, reasonable price.”
Reviews.Author: Mike B
Reviews.Content: Picked the hotel to spend a couple of nights before a cruise,and couldn't be happier. Right on the ocean, with wonderful views, both from the rooms and the breakfast area. Very clean property, very nice breakfast buffet, comfortable beds, great shower, convenient in room fridge and microwave. Close to restaurants and attractions. Friendly staff. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Can't get any closer to the Ocean!”
Reviews.Author: Mary K
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay here...for 2 nights...my husband, I, and our 2 kids ages 16 and 12. (they loved it too!) We were on the 10th floor and the views were awesome! It was super clean & convenient. You can be from your hotel room to the sand beach of the ocean in literally a couple minutes. We asked the hotel desk clerk to recommended a good spot for lunch. She said there were a few good ones under the big bridge (the one you can see from the street in front of the hotel). It was only a couple minutes away & we ended up at a great place called Our Deck Down Under. So good we went back the next day--very casual & excellent seafood. We will stay here again! Really liked the price & everything about it. I'm already planning a return trip here next spring break!

Reviews.Title: “Super Clean, Great Views- Excellent Rates!”
Reviews.Author: hbic_01
Reviews.Content: Lovely little gem in Daytona Beach Shores! Beautiful ocean views- plus a great view of the Halifax. Very clean for being right on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value, Exceptional Service!”
Reviews.Author: AaronJ1973
Reviews.Content: Everything you love and expect from a Holiday Inn Express at beautiful beachfront location. If you really want to enjoy the beach in family friendly environment this is the place to do it!

Reviews.Title: “All rooms oceanfront”
Reviews.Author: Cam7488
Reviews.Content: Stayed six nights, just renovated so everything is new and nice. King bed with pullout in a nice big room, got highest floor terrific view. Like that you can take the elevator from the bottom floor at the beach and not have to go thru the lobby to get to your room. Bring your own beachtowels. Good location in South Daytona away from the action, not as busy and feels safer. Lovely free breakfast in the lobby plenty of seating, average food, love those cinn rolls! Beachfront rooms for terrific sunrises from your balcony, publix and good local restaurants nearby - already booked our stay for this July, can't wait!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel & Catering Venue”
Reviews.Author: R S
Reviews.Content: Over the weekend a baby shower was held in my honor in the Oceanic Room of the hotel. The set up was beautifully done and all management and hotel staff were phenomenal. Especially the General Manager Leah Klindt and the F&B Manager Ida. They were all very attentative and accomodating for all of our needs. I would recommend this venue to anyone. I also stayed at the hotel 2 years ago the night I got married in the honeymoon suite. It was a beautiful room and again the hotel staff were fantastic! I would recommend this hotel for anyone coming to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of what they tell you”
Reviews.Author: Andy L
Reviews.Content: 3/20/12 My name is Andy. We went to Daytona Beach for bike week, and stayed at the Holiday Inn Express and Suites. It was myself, my father and father-in-law. Everything was good up until the end. We decided to leave a day early, as I had previously emailed the manager and got that approved, she said no problem. It was close to 6pm on Friday, so by checking out then its what they call a "late check-out", which is accepted by most all hotels. The girl at the front desk checked me out, and I asked to make sure we would not be charged on more night, as we did not want to waste $240. She said that was no problem, and agreed to let us leave. I signed the receipt for our charges for the room fees for the week, which I agreed was correct. I assumed we were all set. I then today pulled up my online statement today from my bank, and I have 2 additional nights charged on my card. WHY ??? I do not know. I tried calling the hotel,as they explained to me that they needed to charge me and I could not check out late and the person at the front desk was wrong. Basically she told me I'm screwed, even thought they accepted my payment in full for the nights we stayed. I guess people can say or do what they want, but in the end, we fully planned to potentially stay at this hotel again, the rooms were nice. But I don't like the way this was handled, and we wont be going back. I will dispute the charges, and make sure none of my friends or family ever book a room to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Staff!”
Reviews.Author: Rosemary A
Reviews.Content: Nice clean rooms with balcony. Step out the door to the beach. lovely pool and a nice breakfast. Had to be there during bike week so the price was a little high.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place but if you are looking for a resort, this is not it!”
Reviews.Author: DebieDC
Reviews.Content: I did not make this reservation for our short trip to Daytona Beach. I have stayed in many places in Daytona that were a little more resort and this place clearly is called "Express". My review is based on what it is rather than what my friend expected. The hotel staff were EXCELLENT, they allowed us to check in early (about 11:30AM), the facility was kept immaculately clean, the breakfast bar was well stocked (although the hours seemed a little weird; 6:30AM to 9:30AM?), when our in-room safe malfunctioned they came right upstairs and fixed it, and they allowed us a late (one extra hour on the BEACH) check out!!!!! The beach was GORGEOUS and was in close proximity to the hotel, the pool was kind of small, there was no jacuzzi tub and if you had kids the playground was woefully sad. The room itself was nice (but a bit small for the price), the AC worked well, the water pressure on the tenth floor was TERRIBLE (we asked for a lower floor, I don't know what happened there), the wireless internet did not work (perhaps because we were so high up in the building?), the room had two beds (which were INCREDIBLY comfortable!), a table with two chairs, a microwave and small refrigerator, a small coffee maker, a large closet; it really was fine. I don't know that I would stay here again as I really don't go to Daytona Beach for the "express" experience; I really prefer a resort setting. The location from the main attractions and activities in Daytona Beach were MILES away so the beach and surroundings are nice and quiet. If this is what you are looking for it's great. If you are looking to be in the center of the action there are other hotels, even other Holiday Inns that will provide the action. Thanks to the wonderful staff.....EXCELLENT!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place Though...”
Reviews.Author: Matt M
Reviews.Content: Weather didn't cooperate, but hotel was nice. Location is right on the beach. It's a bit of a walk to an ocean front restaurant. But the walk is very nice in good weather though... Only complaint was that the hotel closed down breakfast at 9:30am. 9:30am is reasonable, but we were on vacation and being lazy... My wife was making a bagel, and the hotel staff locked the breakfast fridge as she was reaching for the cream cheese located in the fridge. Very rude... That's when my wife was told breakfast closed at 9:30. Other than the minor attitude at breakfast, the stay was ok.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous stay”
Reviews.Author: dac46
Reviews.Content: Just got back home from an 8 day stay. We were very impressed. From the front desk staff, hotel maintenance, maids, breakfast staff everyone was polite, friendly and always helpful. The common areas and rooms were spotless. The beds were very comfy, nice linens, towels fluffy and clean. Can't beat the view. We were very impressed and will be back. Kathie at the breakfast bar was a star!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place!”
Reviews.Author: Forester9144
Reviews.Content: I think we've found our new favorite spot on Daytona Beach! The newly renovated rooms were very clean, comfy, and very soundproof (even with being by the elevator!). The desk clerks were very courteous, and the manager (Joyce?) did everything she could to make us feel welcome. As for the pool? Spic-and-span. The breakfast was great, especially the cinnamon rolls! The hostess (I think her name was Kathie?) was very friendly and helpful. She was very good with customers, even during periods where, literally, every table was filled.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Fantastic Ocean View”
Reviews.Author: calamityjane10
Reviews.Content: Clean, plush bed, pillows, and towels. Plenty space in the room with a nice deck to sit and watch the beach and waves. very relaxing great staff very helpful

Reviews.Title: “Staying for Rolex 24”
Reviews.Author: Tom4253
Reviews.Content: A very well maintained property with great ocean views, B+ breakfast, great coffee, very quiet HVAC, very comfortable beds and a GREAT staff

Reviews.Title: “Seriously, can you get MORE oceanfront?!”
Reviews.Author: Stephen G
Reviews.Content: Okay, you're here to see the ocean with your sweetie. All you need to make it perfect is a sunrise over the ocean. Well, we got it, and then some! Yes, excellent hotel. Pleasantly appointed, neatly and comfortably decorated, and clean. Very clean!! But seriously, its all about the view! It could not have been more perfect! From the breakfast room (free, YAY!), to the balcony, it was all laid out before us...the most perfect romantic weekend.

Reviews.Title: “great service and location”
Reviews.Author: Globetrekers
Reviews.Content: Excellent customer service. Great location on the beach. Awesome views into the Atlantic and up and down the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: BaseballMom01
Reviews.Content: Front desk personall were fantastic. The hotel rooms seemed brand new. Bathrooms were large and very clean. The hotel room had a refrig and microwave in a small wetbar. Small balcony with a couple chairs overlooking the beach. The hotel pool was very nice as well. They provide a continental breakfast. Above average as far as continental breakfasts go. Would definately return.

Reviews.Title: “Great beachfront hotel”
Reviews.Author: InfreqFlyer
Reviews.Content: Located in Daytona Bch Shores, it's about 7 mi south of the busling frenzy of Daytona Beach. Very peaceful, with the waves pounding the shore, it appears each room in the hotel has that splendid ocean view. It has the biggest and most impressive outdoor pool, walking out to the beach, in the neighbourhood. Nikki, the desk receptionist was very helpful, in satisfying accommodation requests and suggesting activities, including the New Yr's Countdown at the noisier Daytona Bch Oceanfront celebration. If visiting Daytona as a side trip to Orlando, would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: CA_12D
Reviews.Content: The staff was so welcoming and helpful; especially Dave who is the Office Manager and Kevin who checked us in was great, as well as the staff who made the accommodations fabulous! I have stayed in many hotels on the beach in Daytona but had one of the best experiences here. The rooms are all oceanfront; the rooms were so clean and large, the beds very comfortable and the views were magnificent and the complimentary breakfast was great!! As a Holiday Inn priority member, I will be sure to stay again and send all my very "cold friends" from the NE to stay here ! BTW , the pool is beautiful and heated ! Thank you for a great time!! Carolann D.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Oceanfront Rooms”
Reviews.Author: beckyfromtennessee
Reviews.Content: Our family spent Labor Day Weekend here and hope to return. Every room is oceanfront which is not common in Daytona. The hotel is new--was totally stripped to the studs after HI bought the property from a previous private motel owner. The rooms are spacious and beautifully decorated. The only thing I would change would be that there is a metal door to the balcony instead of a sliding glass door limiting the view. Parking was not a problem on the holiday weekend and elevators were fast. The maid did not show up our first day and we had to call about 3 or 4 the next to remind them to send someone. Two of our days the breakfast hostess worked to keep everything full and all was good. On Sunday there was a different woman with a horrible attitude. She disappeared about 9 when everything was empty--we figured she was going to storage to get more food. She returned a long time later and when people asked for eggs or other food, she said, "Breakfast is over". The girl at the front desk worked hard to find and fill things but a lot of people were aggravated. One frustration at this hotel was the amount of people (maybe locals) from the beach who wandered into the pool all weekend long. I was sitting on our balcony one morning and watched cars pull in, park, and make several trips to the beach with tents, coolers, chairs, etc. The cars did not have hotel parking tag. Some were big groups and added a lot of people to the pool on a holiday weekend, and made it difficult for paying guests to get chairs. I wish this was monitored better. This will definitely be our hotel of choice if we return to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “autumn getaway”
Reviews.Author: blessed7_10
Reviews.Content: stayed there 10/5-10/8, 2011. yes the room was nice and clean, all rooms face the ocean, friendly staff, easy access to hotel entrance and beach, free parking, and easy access to get to and from Daytona beach. On this strip you have your banks, grocery stores,Dollar store,etc. This is a quiet end of the strip especially this time of year and if you like quite time. residential area with lots of condos and single family homes. Close to get to the lighthouse and just ride down the strip to St Augustine, I did visit 2 other holiday inns down on the strip also to compare. The other 2 do not offer free breakfast but just as nice. This hotel does have a balcony, mini fridge, and microwave.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice & Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Carol1262
Reviews.Content: Stayed in Daytona 8/2011. The staff was very nice. The rooms were clean and updated, although I think this is a newer hotel. They also include a decent continental breakfast. Would definately stay again. Had oceanfront with a balcany which was a little small, but adaquate. Right on beach.

Reviews.Title: “Oceanfront”
Reviews.Author: Cicero73
Reviews.Content: Great Views, Nice hotel but like all beachfront property starting to show some wear. Positives: View, Bedding, Room Decor. Negatives: Bathroom, Smoking on Balconies in non-smoking rooms, Small pool area. Return Stay-Recommend: Probably not Overall Rating-6.5 Scale 1-worst to 10-best

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: FerrariWidow
Reviews.Content: We came upon this hotel unexpectedly, but what a deal! Excellent service from Kevin at the front desk, lovely included breakfast with Katie at our service each am, lovely quiet room, gorgeous beach and nice pool area - we will stay here again- thank you

Reviews.Title: “Quiet location with nice beachfront rooms”
Reviews.Author: pcampisi
Reviews.Content: All the rooms are beachfront with balconies which is very nice. Room was clean and had a mini fridge and microwave. Nice pool with convenient beach access. Breakfast dining area has nice oceanfront view. Front desk staff was very friendly. This hotel is in a quiet location but less than a 10 minute drive down to the Boardwalk area. Stayed here in July for 2 nights and again in August for 1 night before changing locations to a full service hotel. If you do not need the extra amenities and want a great beachfront location, this is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: Selma B
Reviews.Content: This hotel is newly renovated with all the perks of Holiday Inn Express on the BEACH with amazing ocean views EVERY room has a balcony. The location is south of the busy rundown Daytona Beach Main Street area loaded with overpriced rundown hotels, clubs, and souvenir shops, approximately 6 miles in car. This is a more resort feel stay than standard hotels. The staff was wonderful, the pool was clean and the views were priceless. Best was you can take the elevator straight down to the pool and beach area. You do not need to walk the main lobby in your bathing gear to access the pool/beach. Perfectly convenient! The rooms were clean, spacious, not a standard tight hotel room. We did not get the suite, just a regular King, since it was just my husband and I and we thought it was amazing. On the 8th floor with great views, 2 chairs in the balcony. Small round table with 2 chairs across from a kitchen granite counter with coffeemaker, microwave, and small refrigerator, perfect for warming up leftovers and keeping those water bottles cool. The space was great and the lighting was perfect. Unlike other hotels which are stingy with the light fixtures, you have lighting options all through the room. Nice full mirrors to see yourself, plus a safe in the closet for your jewelry or other important items you need to have and do not want to take down to the beach. The bathroom was newly updated and spotless. Truly clean and a full shower spray made it truly feel like we were in a resort. The staff was nice, effiicent and helpful. They like working there and it shows. The crowd that was at this hotel was very nice, couples, and families. We will definitely make this our favorite spot when in the Daytona area. Everything was near us and Port Orange is right over the bridge and if we wanted the wild side of Daytona we were only a 5 minute drive to the night life. We were disappointed with the breakfast. Not enough food, kept running out and the coffee was terrible. We ended up going out for breakfast not a big deal since there are tons of places to eat in that whole area, even across the street was a breakfast/lunch cafe that we will have to hit next time. After traveling the Daytona Beach area north of us, observing the rundown overpriced crowded visitors hub, we were thrilled to have picked this Holiday Inn compared to their counterparts in the area. Loved it and Planning the next trip already. See my pictures for some sites from and in our room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel...we will be back”
Reviews.Author: annef68
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Express was great. Apparently it just opened in February 2011. Head and shoulders above the hotels in Daytona Beach. Dave, the manager, was very nice and helpful. We had a suite which had a bedroom when you first walked in with a window that looked out the the street side. The bathroom was in the middle and had a nice tub and shower. Then there was the "living room" kitchenette and window that overlooked the beach. Nice balcony overlooking the beach and pool. Parking was FREE! The lobby is very nice and clean. Pool was wonderful. Breakfast buffet was also very nice....pancakes, eggs and sausage amongst all the usual fare. We will stay there again for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Great waterfront place to stay at !”
Reviews.Author: FF8235
Reviews.Content: We were on the tail-end of our Disney trip with only 3 days left before having to drive back to Canada so we decided to show the kids a good time on the beach. The hotel staff is very nice and helpful, our room (an ocean view King suite) was HUGE with a bedroom at one end and a large kitchenette with hot plate and livingroom over-looking the ocean (incl a pull-out). Very clean, smelled good and fresh. The hotel was quiet at night, even with our room's porch giving onto the the pool area where bon fires take place at night, the crowd was respectful and quiet so the kids slept like babies! Highly recommend you stay there while in Daytona. One last note: the beach behind the hotel is amazing and just a few steps away, makes it great to go abck and forth.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jtins
Reviews.Content: We only stayed 2 nights wished it had been longer. Our check in was quick and very pleasant. The front desk clerk was great. The hotel was extremely clean from the room to the hallways, and the pool area. Didnt go down for breakfast till around 9:00 and wasnt expecting to see much left but to our surprise it was well supplied and food still being brought out. I was a little concerned about outside halls but it was no problem and very quite. We have stayed at some really nice places down by the boardwalk and have to say our experience here was much nicer. The rooms were nice size and the view was wonderful. Every employee we encountered was helpful and friendly. Management can be proud of their crew.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again!!”
Reviews.Author: carmelo15
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. You can't beat being able to open a door and have a view of the beach and ocean.Rooms were clean,beds were comfortable, bathrooms were a little small but were very nice.Hotel was fairly busy but rooms were very quiet. The free breakfast was good, better than some of the others I've had. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Our room housekeeper, Sheila, was very friendly, always saying thank you and have a a nice day. Pool area was well kept up and clean. Pool was big enough that you didn't feel crowded and was also clean. Clean, comfortable, and oceanfront rooms with balconies. You can't ask for much more.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: kwt1966
Reviews.Content: This was a good, basic hotel for our stay in Daytona Beach. I'm glad we went a little further south and stayed away from the main area of Daytona Beach. This was a good, clean hotel. Nothing fancy, but it was all we needed. Close to what we wanted to do and see. The bathroom was a bit tight, but other than that it was fine. All rooms are oceanfront, which is great. We have no complaints!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: sportstergirl050
Reviews.Content: My husband and i just returned from a long weekend getaway. We love the Holiday Inn Express Hotel brand and that is why we selected this one. I have to say the room was very clean, the bed as comfortable as ours at home and the staff impeccable! If you are looking for a clean, up to date and great location on the beach, then choose this Holdiay Inn Express. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay!”
Reviews.Author: teachrsue
Reviews.Content: Decided to check out the Holiday Inn Express and Suites in Daytona Beach Shores after seeing some good reviews on how nice it was now that it has a new name and remodel. We stayed in this location when it was the Palm Plaza several years ago and it was in need of a remodel then. We were thrilled with our choice of beach hotel. The rooms are all oceanfront with a private balcony. Hallways are exterior corridors and the buidling is 11 stories high. An oceanfront pool with plenty of loungers surround the pool. There is direct beach access through a set of stairs. The room we had was King executive on the 7th floor. There was a king size bed with comforter and four pillows in two different levels of firmness. The bed was a bit soft for us as we sleep on a very firm mattress. There was a chair, a sofa bed, flat screen cable TV, microwave and mini fridge. The closet is spacious,there is a dresser the TV sits on that has 3 large drawers for storage. A safe is located in the closet for a daily fee, not sure what it is as we didn't use the safe. The bath is average size for a hotel, granite like counter top, shower/tub combo with a rainhead type shower. Towels were nice and we had plenty. Housekeeping was friendly and had visited our room by the time we returned each day after spending time at the beach. The rooms are carpeted and have a modern decor. The rooms have been done very nicely and a great improvement from the past! Breakfast buffet is offered daily free of charge, it can become quite crowded so get there early. Every staff member we met were friendly! Only negative is that the room we had was on the end and there was quite a wind tunnel like sound in the entry way. Both the door and balcony door were shut and locked and you could hear this especially when it was windy outside. If you are bothered by this type of noise, it could be an issue. I am not sure if the seal is not good around the door or it is some other issue. ( It didn't bother us as we sleep with a fan brought from home and it drowns out any outside noises.) It was noticable at times during the day. Also the air condition is a window unit and can be a little noisy if this bothers you, it was a non issue for us. Overall a nice stay, hotel is in a great location, we will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: leenerbop
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this hotel when we stayed there this past April for many reasons. The room was immaculate, the beds were super-comfortable, and the oceanfront view was great! Every staff member I encountered was friendly and helpful. Plus, the price was very reasonable considering the hotel sits right on the ocean. Add a heated ocean-front pool and you've got a great spot! I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Best STAFF EVER”
Reviews.Author: murdock66
Reviews.Content: All staff was great David at front desk was straight up perfect .... But all the Front Desk,Hsk,Maintenance,Good Food brkfast staff needs to slow down a bit but an above average Express.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: gocubs11
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights at the end of June and enjoyed it very much! Nicky was very helpful at check-in and upgraded our room to better accommodate having our college-aged daughters with us. One of the two air conditioners was not working the first night and it was promptly fixed the next morning. The breakfast was very good and the beach was wonderful! We were able to rent an ATV right outside the hotel on the beach. In the evening of the first night, I questioned Julie about our rate that was quoted for the following night because it was much higher. She did not give me any trouble and changed the rate so that both nights were the same rate. We would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “LOVED THE HOTEL, BUT NOT THE ELEVATOR!”
Reviews.Author: LloydlNewOrleans
Reviews.Content: Traveled to Florida to watch the last Space Shuttle launch and decided to stay in Daytona Beach, since all the hotels were booked near Titusville. Based on reviews, decided to stay at Holiday Inn Express and Suites Oceanfront. Had an ocean front room with balcony on the 6th. floor with a great view of the beach and a nice clean room. Complimentary breakfast was very good and the staff was very helpful. However, there was a problem with the elevators malfunctioning. On my 2nd. day there, I got stuck in the elevator and when I tried to use the emergency phone to call the front desk, I discovered that it didn't work. Luckily, I had my cell phone and I was able to call my wife and have her notify the front desk that I was stuck in the elevator. It took them 30 minutes to get me out. After that, I either used the other elevator or the stairs and to my surprise I found out that other people also got stuck in the elevator and that the problem was not with just the one elevator, but both.

Reviews.Title: “Great service but has very dirty carpet!”
Reviews.Author: beachcandi
Reviews.Content: The location was great, the service was great, breakfast was good but our air condition leaked and made the carpet wet around the unit. We tried to avoid that area but when I stepped on it once my socks became incredibly filthy! I'm not sure if the carpet has ever been cleaned!

Reviews.Title: “it was amazingly lovely”
Reviews.Author: dnolan45
Reviews.Content: nice rooms, very clean, very polite staff member's too. i would highly recommend it to everyone. thanks for making our stay nice.

Reviews.Title: “WOULD DEFINITELY STAY HERE AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: letstravelwithash
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 2 nights and wanted to share a few highlights: 1. directly on the beach with beautiful balcony views of the ocean 2. newly renovated, very clean rooms with soft bedding, flat screen TV, microwave and fridge. **When I got there, I had requested a King on my reservation, but the same room was unavailable for 2 nights in a row. The manager DAVE provided great customer service to me and fixed the problem with a smile and positive attitude. This is hospitality, Dave, thank you! Would def stay here again. It is convenient to beach, clean, and provides great customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and a great experience”
Reviews.Author: hopeulikeit
Reviews.Content: This hotel surpassed our expectations. It was new, very clean and nicely furnished. The bathrooms were spotless and the room itself was updated. We liked having the mini fridge and microwave in the room . The balcony was small but peaceful and relaxing. The breakfast was very well done and offered a wide variety of options. The beach was not too crowded and the pool was well taken care of. Originally I was concerned about the exterior entrances of the rooms but this was not a problem at all. You must go through the lobby to get to the elevator to get up to the rooms so we felt very secure. The hotel is near restaurants and shops that were within walking distance. We will definitely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “good experience but major problem”
Reviews.Author: Alan_and_Beth
Reviews.Content: I took my family here for four nights mostly to visit relatives in the area and staying on the beach is a plus. The positives: nice quiet section of the beach, at least in May; totally remodeled hotel, clean, no bad odors, no problems with mold, nice room, great beach view from the balcony, breakfast was fine if expectations are not too high. Decent price using 2 weeks advance prepaid. The negatives: Staff lacks professional manner. The cleaning woman was actually the best we came across. However, the room was only cleaned twice. I think that was because we were in our room mid-morning/midday at times and this interrupted their normal cleaning schedule. While the breakfast area was closely monitored, the lady monitoring it was a grouch. The breakfast (on the beach, mind you) ends at 9:30 SHARP. You might even notice some items being put away a minute or two before that. Earliest clock or watch is the one determining the shut-down. A guest came in as I was still sipping coffee at about 9:45 and he mentioned to the breakfast worker that he thought 9:30 was a little early for a beach breakfast to close (who gets up early while relaxing on the beach?), and she seemed a bit snippy with him. I didn't hear an apologetic response and the guest escalated a little. No big deal, but I had to agree that we were getting up earlier and presentable than we wanted in order to be sure to get something to eat. No pool towels were available for our Sunday evening arrival. It had been a busy day apparently. THE MAJOR PROBLEM: We discovered late on the 3rd day that our room door had a broken lock...and had been this way during our entire stay. We had already noticed that the door didn't close very well and we needed to push or shove it closed otherwise, it would be almost closed but not completely and thus not secure. However, I eventually discovered by chance that one only needed to push on the door to open it, even if it was completely closed. We weighed our options but felt we didn't have time to supervise a door lock repair while we were busy saying goodbye to close relatives that we see once every couple years (my parents), so I decided to simply mention the problem as we checked out. The desk worker didn't even look at me and mumbled that they'd look into it. We were on a tight schedule and didn't have time to raise any sort of fuss over it. I received a standard "how was your stay" email from the national HIE so I mentioned this problem on the survey. They corresponded with me after receiving my full description of the problem and said that the hotel general manager and hotel owner would be notified of the problem. That was 6 days ago. I have not heard any more about it and don't expect to. We were not robbed or harmed and that is good to report. We did barricade the door our final night there since we did spend one night with the knowledge of our door being easily opened to the outside. We were on the 10th floor (Room 1017). I don't know if this was an isolated problem or not. I noticed upon the discovery that the door handle sagged unlike the other rooms' handles. So, if you say here and see a sagging door handle, push on the door a bit and see if it opens up. If so, you probably have an unsecured room as we did. Overall, it was clean and generally pleasant. Security for us was a serious issue but I doubt all the other rooms have this problem. I suspect they've repaired the door lock on 1017. We're conscientious and never damage hotel property; we have no idea how the door lock was damaged. We took a very long, once-in-a-lifetime trip last fall out West. We stayed in over 20 hotels. We stay in hotels in Mexico from time to time. This was the first I can recall of any hotel I've ever stayed in that had a serious room security issue. I was a bit taken aback by it. Probably the rare problem, but you should be aware to check your door carefully in case there is a defect with their locks throughout the property.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect beach hotel”
Reviews.Author: ujustliveonce
Reviews.Content: Rooms were great. It's a recently renovated property. The beach was absolutely gorgeous. The whole hotel was super clean. Breakfast was awesome. There's not a better hotel in Daytona to stay at on the beach and I know because I have stayed at some crappy ones here.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: WendyWood1977
Reviews.Content: We stopped here for one night on our way to Disney World. We had to have a day at the beach!! This hotel was very nice and clean. We had a room on the 10th floor and LOVED the view! Our room was great! It had a really good A/C, fridge, microwave and the beds were very comfortable. The bathroom had the curved shower curtain (which is a must for me) and granite counter tops. There were flat screen tvs. Continental breakfast was excellent, good parking, conveinient to things. The only thing that I didnt like was that the balcony didnt have a sliding glass door. It was a regular door that shut automatically. I like to leave the door open at night so I can hear the ocean. Also, the outside shower didnt work so we had to carry sand in. Overall, we made a great choice on the hotel. I will recommend this to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation ever!!”
Reviews.Author: West_Virginia
Reviews.Content: I hadn't had a vacation in 4 years and was so overdue. Julie and Kevin took my under their wing and made me feel like I was their only guest. They gave me a great room (there's not a bad one), met my every need, recommended fabulous restaurants (Cinco de Mayo fun!), called taxis, recommended a top-rate outfitter for kayaking, a talented hairdresser, and jumped right onto (rare) problems when they arose. I needed to change rooms to accommodate a friend half way thru the week, and they were extremely helpful. The gave me a room just 2 doors down to make the move as easy as possible, and gave me plenty of time to make the move and get the original room key turned in. I can't recommend this place enough. It's away from the crazy core of Daytona Beach which makes it perfect in my opinion. The Cracked Egg across the street is fab for breakfast and lunch. Parking is ample, and every room is directly oceanfront. There wasn't a staff member that I encountered all week who was anything less than personable and caring. Very nice rooms - great beds, refrigerator and microwaves, balcony with chairs - very cozy. The hotel is well build and you don't here noise from surrounding rooms or even doors closing for the most part. Breakfast was good - normal continental breakfast items plus biscuits and gravy and warm cinnamon rolls. Thanks Kevin and Julie! You made my vacation memorable, easy and so much fun!

Reviews.Title: “Safe bet. You won't go wrong with this one.”
Reviews.Author: DaPon78
Reviews.Content: Concerned about picking the right hotel? You should be, because there are some filthy, nasty, terribly conditioned hotels on Daytona Beach & Daytona Beach Shores. However, this is not one of them. This hotel is clean, comfortable, and conveniently located. After reading many reviews for lots of the area's hotel, I went with this one as what I believe to be a safe choice. It proved to be more than a safe choice. It is directly on the beach and I believe every room is facing the ocean and have balconies. Our view was awesome and from only the 3rd floor. I think there were 8 or 9 floors in the hotel. It was quiet and peaceful. I'd recommend this hotel. While there, we visited several other hotels just to compare the facilities and the rooms. While we did see a couple nice ones that were fairly comparable, this one was definitely the best overall. This hotel has one bedroom suites. We did take a few minutes to walk through one. They are a little bigger than their 2 queen bed rooms, but we weren't impressed. They seem backwards as you enter the suite in the bedroom and then move toward the living area where the balcony is overlooking the beach. Unless you get a really good deal or just want an extra bit of space, I'd pass on the suite. Also, the bathroom could stand a bit more space, but it's not so lacking that it makes the overall experience any less memorable. Rooms have small refrigerators and microwaves. No unnecessary frills to pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Beachside Holiday Inn Express”
Reviews.Author: FoxViews
Reviews.Content: After a break from the Daytona area for several years, we decided to go back to see all the changes that have been made since the hurricanes. Trip Advisor reviews helped us make our hotel choice, and this Holiday Inn Express was terrific! Newly renovated and reopened a few months ago, the property is well kept and very clean. Most of the staff are polite and seem to enjoy the guests. Being a Holiday Inn Express, there is a continental breakfast provided with your stay. It is the usual Holiday Inn fare; there is a beautiful breakfast area which overlooks the beach. Word of warning though--even though breakfast is served until 0930, they stop putting out offerings at 0900, so do not wait to go down! Very slim pickings at 0910, yet the breakfast staff refuse to get out any cinnamon rolls, and there was really nothing left. There were still many guests in the breakfast room and more coming down! Pool towels provided, but you may have to wait in a long line at the front desk to get them. The only real complaint is that they may only have one person working the desk for check in/check out/pool towels/questions/etc and that may cause long waits at times. Makes you feel sorry for the poor staff at the desk, because they take the brunt of the anger when the disgruntled guest gets to the front of the line! We would definitely go back to this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Whitebeach34515
Reviews.Content: The hotel is renovated, but the service was terrible. When I first arrived to check in someone was on the phone in the back and it took a long time for someone to come out to the front.to check me in. After I got to my room in the room I called the front desk and no one answered the phone. After several attemps the clerk finally answered and I asked for a couple extra towels because there were only two in my room. The last straw was I had my do not disturb on the door and housekeeping knocked on my door. Hotel is nice but no one seems to care.

Reviews.Title: “unbelievable view”
Reviews.Author: dimdimi4
Reviews.Content: this hotel has been renovated recently and the room looked very nice. breakfast was very good. View is awesome on the top floor. All in all we had a great experience and definitely would come back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this Holiday Inn Express, it was beyond my expectations!”
Reviews.Author: rdbarnette
Reviews.Content: Went to Daytona Beach Bikeweek with my husband. I had read the reviews on trip advisor the recent ones were good reviews but the older ones were not so good. So i was a little worried about the hotel. We stay at Holiday Inn alot when we go on Vacation so I know what to expect from Holiday inn usually. When we walked in I was pleasantly surprised! All you see is OCEAN I loved it. The front desk staff was very friendly and we were a couple hours early but our room was ready so we were able to go ahead and check in. I mentioned to the young lady at the desk that the reviews on TripAdvisior was not so good and i was worried. She informed me that the hotel had just undergone a major remodel. She said it was taken down to the steel and rebuilt. You could tell because it was what i expected from a Holiday Inn Express. They had only been open for 3 weeks. My only complaint was that only one elevator was working. So a few times we had to wait on an elevator. No big deal! Over all our experiance at this Hotel was Great! I would definatly go back again!

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express and Suites Oceanfront
HotelInfo.Address: 3301 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118 (Formerly Palm Plaza Oceanfront Resort)
